lead_paragraph: When the Indiana Pacers lost at San Antonio in December, Monta Ellis and Paul George scored a combined 13 points on 4 of 24 field-goal shooting, helping the Spurs pull away to a comfortable 14-point victory.

headline.print_headline: NBA-Ellis, George Combine to Lead Pacers Past Spurs
headline.main: NBA-Ellis, George Combine to Lead Pacers Past Spurs
